content.body: why does `npm ci` keep hanging forever?
content.formatted_body: why does npm ci keep hanging forever?

content.body: this seems to be most jobs on most commits lately: https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/actions/runs/16186676414/job/45693572328?pr=3642
this isn't new but it used to happen very rarely
